description: Max Arion and Dylan James are touring around Spain on their first vacation together as boyfriends. It’s during this tour that they find a retail shop to swing by and see if there’s anything hot to pick up for the trip. There’s nothing that interests them clothing wise, but there are two guys there, Drew Dixon and Andy Star, and it’s apparent very quickly the four of them are very interested in one another. The store isn’t seeing much foot traffic, and the clerk gives the four guys the green light to strip and fuck in the middle of the sales floor!
title: Max, Dylan, Andy, And Drew’s Hot, Sweaty Retail Trip
